entrypoints.name: succinct-noir-demo
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && cd circuits && nargo check && nargo build && nargo codegen-verifier && cd .. && tar -czvf build/circuits.tar.gz circuits && cp convert_verifier.sh build/ && cp circuits/contract/circuits/plonk_vk.sol build/FunctionVerifier.sol && cp convert_input.sh build/ && cp convert_output.sh build/ && cp Prover.toml build/
entrypoints.proveCommand: cp input.json build/ && cd build && ./convert_input.sh && tar -xzvf circuits.tar.gz && cp Prover.toml circuits/ && cd circuits && nargo prove > ../output.txt && cat ../output.txt | ../convert_output.sh && cat output.json > ../output.json && cd ../..
